definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Putin\'s rise continues to perplex even devoted Kremlin observers.
sentences.chinese: 普京的崛起至今讓克林姆林宮的觀察家們感到迷惑。

sentences.english: And then, there is Bohr's wife who is the observer.
sentences.chinese: 這是波爾的妻子，她是一個觀察家。

sentences.english: Military observers say China's military has long been at that game.
sentences.chinese: 軍事觀察家們講其實中國軍隊老早就這麼幹了。

sentences.english: This changed environment leaves China's Europe watchers flummoxed.
sentences.chinese: 變化的環境讓中國的歐洲觀察家惶惑不安。

sentences.english: Observers were shocked at Steve's emaciated appearance.
sentences.chinese: 觀察家們對其瘦弱的外表頗感震驚。

sentences.english: And it certainly surprises some China-watchers.
sentences.chinese: 而這當然也使一些中國觀察家非常詫異。

sentences.english: Observer Thoahlane also notes that this was a by-election.
sentences.chinese: 觀察家託赫蘭恩還注意到這次選舉本身是遞補選舉。

sentences.english: The experiment was designed to study the condition of rabbit myocardium after 10 000-Volt high tension electricity injury by using light and electron microscopes.
sentences.chinese: 應用光鏡和電鏡觀察家兔在高壓電損傷後的心肌變化。

sentences.english: Not all celebrity watchers were impressed by her choice of outfit.
sentences.chinese: 並非所有名人觀察家都讚賞她的這身裝扮。

sentences.english: Some observers say this was because of the short time available to prepare voters.
sentences.chinese: 一些觀察家說，這是因爲選民只有很短的時間作準備。

sentences.english: Some, his father told The Observer, even threw drinks at him.
sentences.chinese: 還有，他父親告訴觀察家說，甚至很多人朝他扔飲料。
他是一個敏銳的觀察家。

sentences.english: The odor preference of adult M. domestica was measured using a Y-tube olfactometer.
sentences.chinese: 在“Y”形嗅覺儀中觀察家蠅成蟲的氣味選擇行爲。

sentences.english: Observers noted how much Mr Miguet's tactics resembled an electoral campaign.
sentences.chinese: 觀察家指出，米蓋先生的策略太像一場選舉運動了。

sentences.english: Now some observers are changing their tune.
sentences.chinese: 現在，一些觀察家們的口風正在改變。

sentences.english: In neighbouring Bangladesh, eclipse watchers came out in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在鄰近的孟加拉國，月食觀察家出來趨之若鶩。

definition: to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4

definition: principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
